positive_examples: This is an example of value alignment.
The value alignment demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed value alignment in this context.
A typical case of value alignment would involve these features.
The concept of value alignment applies here.
The process of ensuring AI systems pursue goals and values that match human intentions and preferences.
negative_examples: This is an example of non deceptive alignment, not value alignment.
This represents a i alignment process in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NonDeceptiveAlignment, or other types of AIAlignmentProcess

definition: The process of ensuring AI systems pursue goals consistent with human values and intentions.
